trash_empty.message: Click on the trash icon to delete an item.
trash_empty.title: Move to trash everything you don't need.

trash_empty.message: Click the trash icon to delete an item.
trash_empty.title: The trash is empty.
Keep your workspace clean: delete all items you don't need anymore.

trash_full.title: Select and restore your items that are now in the trash.

trash_full.message: Select an item to restore it or delete it permanently.

trash_full.message: Or, when possible, select it and restore it in its original folder.

addShare.noteDescription: The standard message displays your name, the name of the shared item, permissions granted to the recipients and sign in information.

role.editorDescription: It will be able to view and edit the item
role.viewerDescription: It will only be able to view or download the item

popover.sharingAllowedDescription: It will be able to manage shares of the item

share.noSharePermissionHeader: You are not allowed to share this item.

uploads.message: Here you can find all the items that are currently uploading, you can manage them from here.
uploads.title: Upload suggestions

tooltip.disabledByDocs: This version cannot be opened by the online editor
tooltip.disabledByMaxKeepVersion: You have reached the maximum number of versions to keep forever
tooltip.disabledByMaxVersion: You have reached the maximum number of versions
tooltip.disabledByPermission: You don't have the correct permissions
tooltip.disabledByVersionKeepForever: Versions marked to be kept forever cannot be deleted

version.mainHint: Files saves the last {{maxVersions}} versions of your items. You can manually delete any item version or restore one as the current version. Select one or more versions that you want to keep forever.

message.disabled: You cannot drop your items in this area.
message.enabled:
Drop here your items 
 to quickly move them to this folder.

filter.hint: It looks like there's nothing here.
filter.recents: It looks like there are no recent items yet.
filter.sharedByMe: You haven't shared any item with your collaborators yet.
filter.sharedWithMe: There are no items shared with you yet.

folder.hint: It seems that this folder is empty.
folder.state: Drag a file or create a new one clicking "NEW".

search.hint: Your search didn't match any files or folders.
noResults: None of your items matches your search.
search.notRun: No search was carried out yet.

errorCode.code_ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND: It seems that this email is not associated to a user
errorCode.code_FILE_VERSION_NOT_FOUND: We're sorry, but this version of the item cannot be found
errorCode.code_LINK_NOT_FOUND: Action failed. This link no longer exists
errorCode.code_MISSING_FIELD: An internal error occurred, not all information of this item has been recovered
errorCode.code_NODE_COPY_ERROR: Sorry, copy of the item failed. Try again
errorCode.code_NODE_DUPLICATED: There is an item with the same name in this folder
errorCode.code_NODE_NOT_FOUND: It seems that this item doesn't exist, or you do not have permission to access it
errorCode.code_NODE_WRITE_ERROR: It seems that this item cannot be edited or that you do not have permission to edit it
errorCode.code_SHARE_CREATION_ERROR: We are sorry, but it is not possible to share the item with this user
errorCode.code_SHARE_NOT_FOUND: We're sorry, but this share cannot be found
errorCode.code_VERSIONS_LIMIT_REACHED: The operation cannot be completed. You have reached the maximum limit.

decreaseYourOwnSharePermissions.body: Are you sure to decrease your rights on this item? The action is permanent and you won't be able to restore the previous share's rights by yourself. You can always contact the shared item's owner if you need the previous permission to be restored.

deletePermanently.body: You will delete permanently this item/these items. You will not be able to recover this item/these items anymore. This action is irreversible.

deleteShare.body: Are you sure to remove all the access permission previously given to {{shareTarget}} ?

body.answer: Are you sure to remove yourself from this collaboration?
body.permissionLost: All the access permissions previously given to you will be lost.

newFolder.disabled: You don't have the correct permissions
newFolder.label: New folder

purgeAllVersions.body: All versions that are not marked to be kept forever, except the current one, will be deleted. You will not be able to recover these versions.

removeLink.body: This link has expired, therefore it can't be used anymore to access the item. You can remove the link from the list or you can update its expiration date and other information in order to keep using it.

revokeCollaborationLink.body: By revoking this link, you are blocking the possibility to create new shares with it. Everyone who has already used the collaboration link will keep the access to the item.

revokeLink.body: By revoking this link, you are blocking access to {{nodeName}} for anyone who tries to use the link to access the item.

body.line1: Are you sure you want to leave this page without saving?
body.line2: All your unsaved changes will be lost.

tooltip.confirm: You can't perform this action here

not.allowed: You cannot move multiple items from a filter or a search
